DOC.brief_summary: A multi-centre , evaluator-blinded study subject undergo cheek augmentation . The study design assess efficacy regard aesthetic midface augmentation safety treatment HA product .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Safety Hyaluronic Acid ( HA ) Product Cheek Augmentation
